files.example.com/cert.yaml:
apiVersion: certmanager.k8s.io/v1alpha1
kind: Certificate
metadata:
 name: wildcard.example.com
spec:
 secretName: wildcard.example.com
 issuerRef:
   name: letsencrypt-staging
   kind: ClusterIssuer
 dnsNames:
   - '*.example.com'
 acme:
   config:
     - dns01:
         provider: staging-dns
       domains:
         - '*.example.com'
